body.name: MORENTO Smart Air Purifier for home Large Rooms up to 1076 ft², Wi-Fi and Alexa compatible, PM2.5 Air Quality Display, Auto Mode, Quiet Mode 24dB, HEPA Filter Removes Dust, Pollen, Smoke (White)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 17 hrs 52 mins
features: Enjoy Clean Air: MORENTO HY4866-WF smart air purifiers for home can be used at home to effectively capture 99.97% of airborne particles with a size of 0.3 microns, including dust and pollen. This air purifiers for home large room with a CADR of up to 300 m ³/ h, one air change per hour can be completed for rooms up to 1076 ft² or 100 m². This air purifier for home can use with the “Havaworks” app to monitor the air quality from your phone in real-time.

App-Enabled Wi-Fi Control: Use the “Havaworks” app to turn your air purifiers for home into a remote. Set an active schedule for convenience or manually control the settings for a burst of clean air. Monitor the air quality and check the filter life on this hepa air purifie's display or APP at your leisure.
Intelligent Voice Control: Go hands-free and use your voice to monitor and change the HY4866-WF hepa air purifier's settings through Amazon Alexa or Google Assistant.

High Efficiency Filtration: The double air intake design of this hepa air purifiers for home allows the multi-layer HEPA filters to purify from both sides simultaneously, increasing the purification speed. The smart display of this air purifiers for home and app monitors the filter life and will let you know when to replace them. Search for B0BMDYDXFK (enhanced) or B0C3GWNR29 (original) on Amazon for replacement filters.

Sleep Well: In sleep mode, this air purifier for bedroom will run at its lowest fan speed at less than 24dB (the equivalence of ambient silence) with the display lights off. Enjoy an interrupted night’s rest with clean air. Activating the display of the air purifier will exit sleep mode.

4 Fan Speeds: Select from fan speeds of 1F/2F/3F/4F for this HY4866-WF hepa air purifier for home; the higher the fan speed, the quicker the air is filtered and purified. In automatic mode, the fan speed will automatically adjust to the air quality. Couple this with a 2/5/8 hour timer to have this air purifier for bedroom run for the designated period of time while sleeping or heading out.

Air Quality Monitoring: The PM2.5 infrared sensor monitors the air quality in real-time and displays this information on the screen of MORENTO smart air purifiers and on the “Havaworks” app. If the air quality drops, the screen of air purifiers for home large room will display yellow or red and the app will send a notification in accordance to current air quality rating.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quiet, compact, fits anywhere, very versatile.
reviews.reviewText: Great air purifier. Compact and lightweight, but still moves a lot of air. Simple set up and easy to use. Two large filter’s that are easily accessible to clean or change as needed.I placed my purifier next to my desk and I can barely hear it operating. Cool looking display that lets you know what is going on.I was looking for an air purifier that was not too large, yet moved a lot of air. This one fit the bill and gets the job done.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Superb product. Cleans air quickly, quietly, and efficiently,
reviews.reviewText: Am extremely pleased with the Morento air purifier unit and would recommend this product based on its excellent performance.The product is of high quality, is a great value for the price , and does an excellent job in purifying the air and clearing pollutants from the home.With having pets air quality is always of concern. In addition clean air is a necessity when having family members with asthma or allergies or other health conditions. The Morento air purifier cleans the air, keeps our home free from pollutants, is easily to use , runs quietly, and gives us added peace of mind.The Morento air purifier has a sleek modern design. The control panel is intuitive and easy to operate. The fan is very quite . The instruction manual was easy to follow and set up of the Morento air purifier took only minutes.The App-Enabled Wi-Fi Control enablesusers with the ability to control the Morento air purifier from their smartphone devices while at home or while away. The smartphone app for the Morento air purifier integrated easily with Amazon alexa app for intelligent voice control.Appreciate the child lock functionality , the timer functions, and the ability to check filter life. An added bonus is the ability to invite other family members to utilize the smartphone app to have visibility to see the air quality in addition to other control functions of the Morento purifier unit.This product has exceeded my expectations and highly recommend this product if you are looking for an air purifier that is a great value and quality product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Morento is an Awesome Home Air Purification device
reviews.reviewText: I bought the MORENTO Smart Air Purifier to replace another brand that I had for many years. After using this air purifier for over a while now, I would highly recommend this for anyone desiring clean fresh smelling air inside your home. I have to say that the Moento Air Purifier not only replaces but performs much better than my old unit. I have health concerns and need to make sure that I breathe clean air as much as possible. With this device I can. This Air Purifier has HEPA filtration that effectively prevents even the smallest particles in the air that are harmful to your health from remaining in your environment. I have a dog and am allergic to many airborne pollutants. I have noticed a big difference in the way I can now breathe easier, my room seems to smell better and accumulate less dust on flat surfaces.The Morento Smart Air Purifier is small enough to fit into almost any room in my house without seeming to be out of place yet large enough to get the job done well. I love the smart features that allow me to read and adjust features from my smart phone. As well as being able to control the device from my phone, I can use the control panel on the top of the purifier. It comes with a LED screen that tells you exactly what is going on with the purifier from Air quality, WIFI connectivity, filter status and other things. It will allow you to choose different air/fan speeds manually or allow it to control the air speed based on the quality of air. This is the setting I prefer as it constantly monitors and controls the purification of the air. It has a sensor on the rear of the device that reads the air quality which is how it knows how to automatically choose the air speeds.I keep this particular device in my bedroom keeping the front and back 15 or more inches away from walls and surfaces. I love the fact that it is so quiet in sleep mode that you don't know it is running. It also dims the display so as not to disturb your sleep. During the day I typically leave it in auto to let it do its thing.Setup was a breeze. You download the app to your phone, and a minute or so you are up and running. You can control this device through Alexa or Google to make it even more convenient.Well thought out product that I hope will keep my air cleaner for years to Come. I have researched the replacement filters that you may need to replace after about 6 months use, I find that they are reasonably priced on Amazon and other vendors at reasonable prices.
